title: Denoising Multi-Level Cross-Attention and Contrastive Learning for Chest Radiology Report Generation
details: D Zhu, L Liu, X Yang, L Liu, W Peng - Journal of Imaging Informatics in Medicine, 2025
abstract: Chest radiology report generation plays a vital role in supporting diagnosis, alleviating physician workload, and reducing the risk of misdiagnosis. However, significant challenges persist:(1) Data bias and background noise in chest images …
